betterquesting:10.desc:8:
I now know how the Shyre Empire can easily put an end to entire planets so easily. 
The behemoths of the land of coral, the Deepest Ones, the warriors of L'Borean are the planet-annhilators of the Shyre Empire.
Just like a virus, a parasite that repurposes the genome of its host to produce more of itself, the world soul underneath the coral world of L'Borean has infected the entirety of its beings, transforming them into extremely powerful warriors, which are in turn used to spread other world souls of the same type.
The products of this corruption are capable of exsting in higher dimensions, just like the Old Ones, and carry their blight through the space-time they traverse.
This reminds of the Dread Plague, in some way, but at a much larger, and more fundamental, scale.
